name: agents-inc

plugins.description: PostHog analytics and feature flags setup

plugins.description: Better Auth patterns, sessions, OAuth

plugins.description: Drizzle ORM, queries, migrations

plugins.description: Prisma ORM, type-safe queries, migrations, relations

plugins.name: api-email-resend-react-email
plugins.description: Resend + React Email templates

plugins.name: api-email-setup-resend
plugins.description: Resend email setup, domain verification

plugins.name: api-flags-posthog-flags
plugins.description: PostHog feature flags, rollouts, A/B testing. Use when implementing gradual rollouts, A/B tests, kill switches, remote configuration, beta features, or user targeting with PostHog.

plugins.name: api-framework-express
plugins.description: Express.js routes, middleware, error handling, request/response patterns

plugins.name: api-framework-fastify
plugins.description: Fastify routes, JSON Schema validation, plugin system, TypeScript type providers

plugins.name: api-framework-hono
plugins.description: Hono routes, OpenAPI, Zod validation

plugins.name: api-observability-axiom-pino-sentry
plugins.description: Pino logging, Sentry error tracking, Axiom - structured logging with correlation IDs, error boundaries, performance monitoring, alerting

plugins.name: api-observability-setup-axiom-pino-sentry
plugins.description: Pino, Axiom, Sentry installation - one-time project setup for logging and error tracking with source maps upload

plugins.name: api-performance-api-performance
plugins.description: Query optimization, caching, indexing

plugins.name: cli-framework-cli-commander
plugins.description: Node.js CLI development with Commander.js, @clack/prompts, and picocolors. Command structure, interactive prompts, state machines, error handling, exit codes, configuration hierarchies.

plugins.name: cli-framework-oclif-ink
plugins.description: Modern CLI development combining oclif's command framework with Ink's React-based terminal rendering

plugins.name: infra-env-setup-env
plugins.description: Environment configuration, Zod validation

plugins.name: infra-monorepo-turborepo
plugins.description: Turborepo, workspaces, package architecture, @repo/* naming, exports, tree-shaking

plugins.name: infra-tooling-setup-tooling
plugins.description: ESLint 9 flat config, Prettier, TypeScript configuration, Vite, Husky + lint-staged, commitlint - build tooling for monorepos

plugins.name: meta-methodology-anti-over-engineering
plugins.description: Anti-over-engineering principles - surgical implementation, not architectural innovation. Use existing utilities, minimal changes, follow established conventions. No new abstractions.

plugins.name: meta-methodology-context-management
plugins.description: Long-term context management protocol - maintain project continuity across sessions through systematic documentation. Progress tracking, decision logging, insight preservation.

plugins.name: meta-methodology-improvement-protocol
plugins.description: Self-improvement protocol for agents modifying their own prompts/configurations. Evidence-based improvements, structured changes, proven patterns from research.

plugins.name: meta-methodology-investigation-requirements
plugins.description: Investigation requirement - never speculate about code you haven't read. List files, read completely, base analysis on evidence. Prevents hallucination in coding agents.

plugins.name: meta-methodology-success-criteria
plugins.description: Success criteria template - every task needs explicit, measurable criteria defining "done". Specific, measurable, achievable, verifiable requirements with verification checklist.

plugins.name: meta-methodology-write-verification
plugins.description: Write verification protocol - never report success without verifying work was actually saved. Re-read files after edits, verify changes exist, only report success after verification passes.

plugins.name: meta-research-research-methodology
plugins.description: Investigation flow (Glob -> Grep -> Read), evidence-based research with file:line references, structured output format for AI consumption. Use for pattern discovery, implementation research, and codebase investigation.

plugins.name: meta-reviewing-cli-reviewing
plugins.description: CLI code review patterns. Use when reviewing CLI applications built with Commander.js, @clack/prompts, picocolors. Covers exit codes, signal handling, error messages, user experience, testing adequacy.

plugins.name: meta-reviewing-reviewing
plugins.description: Code review patterns, feedback principles. Use when reviewing PRs, implementations, or making approval/rejection decisions. Covers self-correction, progress tracking, feedback principles, severity levels.

plugins.name: mobile-framework-expo
plugins.description: Expo managed workflow

plugins.name: mobile-framework-react-native
plugins.description: React Native mobile development patterns - New Architecture (Fabric, TurboModules, JSI), component architecture, React Navigation 7+, styling with StyleSheet/NativeWind, FlashList v2 optimization, gestures with Reanimated 4, platform-specific code, Expo SDK 52-54, React 19 features

plugins.name: security-auth-security
plugins.description: Authentication, authorization, secrets management, XSS prevention, CSRF protection, Dependabot configuration, vulnerability scanning, DOMPurify sanitization, CSP headers, CODEOWNERS, HttpOnly cookies

plugins.name: web-accessibility-web-accessibility
plugins.description: WCAG, ARIA, keyboard navigation

plugins.name: web-animation-css-animations
plugins.description: CSS Animation patterns - transitions, keyframes, scroll-driven animations, View Transitions API, GPU-accelerated properties, accessibility with prefers-reduced-motion

plugins.name: web-animation-framer-motion
plugins.description: Motion (formerly Framer Motion) animation patterns - motion components, variants, gestures, layout animations, scroll-linked animations, accessibility

plugins.name: web-animation-view-transitions
plugins.description: View Transitions API patterns - same-document transitions, cross-document MPA transitions, shared element animations, pseudo-element styling, accessibility

plugins.name: web-data-fetching-graphql-apollo
plugins.description: Apollo Client GraphQL patterns - useQuery, useMutation, cache management, optimistic updates, subscriptions

plugins.name: web-data-fetching-graphql-urql
plugins.description: URQL GraphQL client patterns - useQuery, useMutation, exchange architecture, caching strategies, subscriptions

plugins.name: web-data-fetching-swr
plugins.description: SWR data fetching patterns - useSWR, useSWRMutation, caching, revalidation, infinite scroll

plugins.name: web-data-fetching-trpc
plugins.description: tRPC type-safe API patterns, procedures, React Query integration

plugins.name: web-error-handling-error-boundaries
plugins.description: Error boundary patterns, fallback UI, reset/retry functionality, react-error-boundary library

plugins.name: web-error-handling-result-types
plugins.description: TypeScript Result/Either types for type-safe error handling, railway-oriented programming patterns, error as values

plugins.name: web-files-file-upload-patterns
plugins.description: File upload patterns - drag-drop dropzones, chunked/resumable uploads, S3 presigned URLs, file validation (MIME type, magic bytes), progress tracking, image preview, accessibility (ARIA)

plugins.name: web-files-image-handling
plugins.description: Client-side image handling - preview generation, Canvas API resizing, compression, EXIF orientation, format conversion, memory management with object URL cleanup

plugins.name: web-forms-react-hook-form
plugins.description: React Hook Form patterns - useForm, Controller, useFieldArray, validation resolver, performance optimization

plugins.name: web-forms-vee-validate
plugins.description: VeeValidate v4 patterns - useForm, useField, defineField, useFieldArray, schema validation with Composition API

plugins.name: web-forms-zod-validation
plugins.description: Zod schema validation patterns for TypeScript - schema definitions, type inference, refinements, transforms, discriminated unions

plugins.name: web-framework-angular-standalone
plugins.description: Angular 17-19 standalone components, signals, control flow, dependency injection patterns

plugins.name: web-framework-nextjs-app-router
plugins.description: Next.js 15 App Router patterns - file-based routing, Server/Client Components, streaming, Suspense, metadata API, parallel routes, Turbopack, async params

plugins.name: web-framework-nextjs-server-actions
plugins.description: Server Actions patterns for mutations, revalidation, and form handling in Next.js App Router

plugins.name: web-framework-nuxt
plugins.description: Nuxt 3 patterns - file-based routing, data fetching (useFetch/useAsyncData), useState, server routes, middleware, auto-imports, layouts, SEO

plugins.name: web-framework-react
plugins.description: Component architecture, hooks, patterns

plugins.name: web-framework-remix
plugins.description: File-based routing, loaders, actions, defer streaming, useFetcher, error boundaries, progressive enhancement

plugins.name: web-framework-solidjs
plugins.description: SolidJS fine-grained reactivity patterns - signals, effects, memos, stores, createResource, control flow components, Suspense, SolidStart

plugins.name: web-framework-vue-composition-api
plugins.description: Vue 3 Composition API patterns, reactivity primitives, composables, lifecycle hooks

plugins.name: web-i18n-next-intl
plugins.description: Type-safe i18n for Next.js App Router

plugins.name: web-i18n-react-intl
plugins.description: ICU message format internationalization

plugins.name: web-i18n-vue-i18n
plugins.description: Type-safe i18n for Vue 3 Composition API

plugins.name: web-mocks-msw
plugins.description: MSW handlers, browser/server workers, test data. Use when setting up API mocking for development or testing, creating mock handlers with variants, or sharing mocks between browser and Node environments.

plugins.name: web-performance-web-performance
plugins.description: Bundle optimization, render performance

plugins.name: web-pwa-offline-first
plugins.description: Local-first architecture with sync queues

plugins.name: web-pwa-service-workers
plugins.description: Service Worker lifecycle, caching strategies, offline patterns, update handling, precaching, runtime caching

plugins.name: web-realtime-socket-io
plugins.description: Socket.IO v4.x client patterns, connection lifecycle, reconnection, authentication, rooms, namespaces, acknowledgments, binary data, TypeScript integration

plugins.name: web-realtime-sse
plugins.description: Server-Sent Events for unidirectional server-to-client streaming, EventSource API, fetch streaming, reconnection patterns, message parsing

plugins.name: web-realtime-websockets
plugins.description: Native WebSocket API patterns, connection lifecycle, reconnection strategies, heartbeat, message typing, binary data, custom hooks

plugins.name: web-server-state-react-query
plugins.description: REST APIs, React Query, data fetching

plugins.name: web-state-jotai
plugins.description: Atomic state management with auto-dependency tracking

plugins.name: web-state-mobx
plugins.description: MobX observable state management patterns with mobx-react-lite. Use when implementing reactive client state with observables, computed values, actions, and the observer HOC.

plugins.name: web-state-ngrx-signalstore
plugins.description: NgRx SignalStore patterns for Angular state management. Use when managing client state with Angular Signals, composing store features, handling entities, or integrating RxJS effects.

plugins.name: web-state-pinia
plugins.description: Pinia stores, Vue 3 state patterns. Use when managing client state in Vue applications, choosing between Options/Setup stores, composing stores, or implementing persistence.

plugins.name: web-state-redux-toolkit
plugins.description: Redux Toolkit patterns for complex client state. Use when managing enterprise-scale state, needing DevTools, entity normalization, or RTK Query for data fetching.

plugins.name: web-state-zustand
plugins.description: Zustand stores, client state patterns. Use when deciding between Zustand vs useState, managing global state, avoiding Context misuse, or handling form state.

plugins.name: web-styling-cva
plugins.description: Class Variance Authority - type-safe component variant styling with cva(), compound variants, and VariantProps

plugins.name: web-styling-scss-modules
plugins.description: SCSS Modules, cva, design tokens

plugins.name: web-styling-tailwind
plugins.description: Tailwind CSS v4 - utility-first CSS framework with CSS-first configuration

plugins.name: web-testing-cypress-e2e
plugins.description: Cypress E2E testing patterns - test structure, data-cy selectors, cy.intercept() mocking, custom commands, fixtures, component testing, accessibility testing with cypress-axe, and CI/CD integration

plugins.name: web-testing-playwright-e2e
plugins.description: Playwright E2E testing patterns - test structure, Page Object Model, locator strategies, assertions, network mocking, visual regression, parallel execution, fixtures, and configuration

plugins.name: web-testing-react-testing-library
plugins.description: React Testing Library patterns - query hierarchy, userEvent, async utilities, renderHook, custom render with providers, accessibility-first testing

plugins.name: web-testing-vitest
plugins.description: Playwright E2E, Vitest, React Testing Library - E2E for user flows, unit tests for pure functions only, network-level API mocking - inverted testing pyramid prioritizing E2E tests

plugins.name: web-testing-vue-test-utils
plugins.description: Vue Test Utils patterns - mount, shallowMount, wrapper API, trigger, setValue, flushPromises, testing composables, Pinia store mocking

plugins.name: web-tooling-storybook
plugins.description: Storybook 8 patterns - CSF 3.0, args, controls, autodocs, play functions, interaction testing, visual testing, addons configuration

plugins.name: web-ui-radix-ui
plugins.description: Unstyled accessible UI primitives

plugins.name: web-ui-shadcn-ui
plugins.description: shadcn/ui component library patterns, CLI usage, theming, customization

plugins.name: web-ui-tanstack-table
plugins.description: TanStack Table v8 patterns - useReactTable, column definitions, sorting, filtering, pagination, row selection, virtual scrolling, server-side data

plugins.name: web-utilities-date-fns
plugins.description: date-fns patterns for TypeScript - formatting, parsing, manipulation, comparison, timezone handling, and internationalization
